title: SHEET PAN PINEAPPLE CHICKEN FAJITAS RECIPE
directions: Preheat oven to 425Â°. In a large bowl, mix first five ingredients; stir in chicken. Add onion, peppers, pineapple, honey and lime juice; toss to combine. Spread evenly in two greased 15x10x1-in. pans.
Roast 10 minutes, rotating pans halfway through cooking. Remove pans from oven; preheat broiler.

Broil chicken mixture, one pan at a time, 3-4 in. from heat until vegetables are lightly browned and chicken is no longer pink, 3-5 minutes. Serve in tortillas with toppings and lime wedges as desired. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 large red or sweet onion, halved and sliced (about 2 cups)
1 large sweet red pepper, cut into 1/2-inch strips
1 large green pepper, cut into 1/2 inch strips
2 cans (8 ounces each) unsweetened pineapple tidbits, drained
Optional toppings: pico de gallo, sour cream, shredded Mexican cheese blend and sliced avocado
